CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Pony is a global leader in achieving large-scale commercialization of autonomous mobility. On the public roads of China's metropolises, Pony has achieved what was once only depicted in science fiction-building a car that drives itself. We currently operate a fleet of over 250 robotaxis and over 190 robotrucks, both independently and in collaboration with Sinotrans, China's largest freight logistics company.
